Generation IX.Scarlet: This species left the ocean and began living on land a very long time ago. It seems to be closely related to Wailmer .
Generation IX.Violet: It lives in frigid regions in pods of five or so individuals. It loves the minerals found in snow and ice.

Generation IX.Scarlet: West Province: Area Three North Province: Dalizapa Passage , Glaseado Mountain Tera Raid Battles ( 3★ )
Generation IX.Violet: West Province: Area Three North Province: Dalizapa Passage , Glaseado Mountain Tera Raid Battles ( 3★ )
